name: Cosmic Chef - Breakfast Rush
description:
Dish out some healthy breakfasts that are out of this world!

How to play:

Click the circles in front of the chef to place the plates. Then click the meat shown in the upper-right corner, clicking the pan its cooked in when it's done (before it burns) to serve it. Click the bread and/or drink shown to serve them. (When fruit is served, click the slicer to prepare it, and then again to serve it.) When the order is ready, click the arrow next to the plates to serve them. Serve all the customers before time runs out.
